# Security Policy

## Reporting Security Vulnerabilities

Thank you for helping keep ScannerFlow secure. We take all security issues seriously.

To report a security vulnerability, please send an email to [your-email@example.com] with the following information:

*   **Vulnerability Details:** Describe the vulnerability in detail, including the specific location in the code, the impact of the vulnerability, and steps to reproduce it.
*   **Proof of Concept (PoC):** If possible, provide a proof of concept that demonstrates the vulnerability.
*   **Affected Version(s):** Specify the version(s) of ScannerFlow affected by the vulnerability.
*   **Your Contact Information:** (Optional) Provide your contact information so we can follow up with you.

We will acknowledge your report within 24-48 hours and will do our best to address the vulnerability as quickly as possible.

## Security Best Practices

ScannerFlow follows security best practices to protect user data and ensure the integrity of the application. Some of these practices include:

*   **Input Validation:** All user inputs are validated to prevent injection attacks.
*   **Authentication and Authorization:** Secure authentication and authorization mechanisms are in place to protect user accounts and data.
*   **Data Encryption:** Sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
*   **Regular Security Audits:** We conduct regular security audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
*   **Dependency Management:** We use a package manager to keep dependencies up-to-date and address any known vulnerabilities.
*   **Secure Coding Practices:** We follow secure coding practices to prevent common security vulnerabilities.

## Security Updates

We will provide security updates as needed to address any identified vulnerabilities. Users are encouraged to update to the latest version of ScannerFlow to ensure they have the latest security patches.

## Contact

If you have any questions or concerns about the security of ScannerFlow, please contact us at [your-email@example.com].
